cRefPattern.p: This pattern references a specific line.
This pattern references an inscribed surface.
This pattern references a specific artefact, usually a tablet.

div.l: [...] kalam#?-ma lu2 nu-še-[ga ...]
[...] ⸢e2⸣-kiš-nu-gal2 KA x [...]
[...] x en3 tar gu2 an-še3#? [...]
[...] x x nam-mah-ni x [...]
[...]-erim2#?-še3 šu zi-⸢ga⸣ lul zi x x [...]
[...] ki ag2 nig2-gi-na geš!?-la2-bi nu-x-[...]
[...] ⸢ug3⸣ lu-a inim ša3-⸢ga⸣ lul zi x x x
[...] x-gin7 ku-kur il2-la a-ra2-bi x nu-x-x-x
[...] NI si-ge x x DE2#? SU an-ki-a x x x
[...] x-ma x uludin2#? gu4?-alim#?-ma nun-na
[...] x x x x x x ti-ri2-da nu-gal2#?
[...] igi bar#? lu2 sa6 inim#? sa6-ge ku4-ku4-da-zu ga2-la nu?-x-x-x
[...] x-e geš tuku šu ⸢sa2⸣ giri17 šu gal2 šu si sa2-še3 igi-ni? i3#?-⸢gal2⸣
[...] x-da-zu šu nu-kar2-kar2 mu-ni pa3-da {d}lamma-zu GILIM x KUR x
[...] x x {geš}rab3 gal ug3 ⸢šar2⸣-ra u4 mir erim2 ru-ru-gu2?
[...] a2 ag2-bi šid-šid a-ra2-bi GALAM EN
⸢siskurx(|AMAR.AMAR|)⸣ dingir-re-e-ne ka ba-ni lu2 sa6-ge#? [...]
[...] ni2-te-na e3 i-lim-bi kur-kur-ra ⸢dul⸣-[...]
[...] nam-sa6-ge šu du7 sag-ki huš la-la x-[...]
[...] x NIG2 eš3 e2-kiš-nu-gal2 nin?-zu? x [...]
[...] igi#?-za? še-eb u4 nam-ti-la su3-u4 x [...]
[...] x-bi he2-me-en mu ⸢pa3⸣ x x [...]
[...] x x-bi2-ib u3-ma gub#?-[...]
... of/in the land, the disobedient person ...
... the Ekišnugal temple ...
... the one who inquires after ..., raising? ... above
... his greatness ...
... raising a hand (violently) against the evildoer, ... falsehood and truth ...
... lover of justice, its deathly silence did not arrive(?)
... the thriving people ..., (their?) false and true thought(s)
... forming a wave like ..., its course ... did not ...
... the flesh/skin(!?) of the universe
... its features (that of?) a “noble bison”
... the runaway/outcast/outlaw was not present?
Your .... that brings in(?) ...(?) ...
... your look(?) that brings in(?) good people who are praying/flattering(?) does not cease(?)
... who pays attention to attentiveness, ..., stroking the nose in submission, and setting things in order by hand(?)
Your ... does not denigrate, his chosen name, your protective lamma, ...
..., great neckstock of the mult{iti}inous people, furious storm opposing the enemy(?)
..., reciting its commands, ... its way
... his ordering of the siskur offerings(?) of the gods betters man(kind)(?)
... coming/bringing out ... by himself/his own, its aura covering the lands
... perfecting goodness, fearsome temples, satisfying with (its) plentitude/happiness(?)
... shrine Ekišnugal, your lady(?) ...
... in your front brickwork, ... prolonging the days of lifetime ...
May you be its ..., chosen name ...
..., attain a victory(?)
... so that ...
